messages.subject: Contact info for Mark Scherer?
messages.msgSnippet: I need to get in touch with Mark Scherer regarding delivery of his kanteisho from the Chicago shinsa. Does anyone have a current email, phone number or address
messages.messageBody:
I need to get in touch with Mark Scherer regarding delivery of his kanteisho from the Chicago shinsa.

Does anyone have a current email, phone number or address for Mark? I believe that he is in Illinois. Please respond off list.

Thanks,
Jim

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
